My Education and Certificate

IT Education

  • Hillel School

    Front-End Basic | Odessa (2019)

    In 2019, he began to study Front-End basic training in Odessa school, lasted 4 months after graduating from the school and got a good basis for working with HTML5 and CSS3 and preprocessors. He was interviewed and received a certificate with excellent marks.

    Web Development (2019-2020)

    Completed the course Web Developer and JavaScript + React from a high-level teacher, Petrychenko Ivan. A lot of practice and a lot of good actual material. In addition, I completed course of GIT. All certificates can be found by clicking on the button below.
